answers.answer: Hi there,Nothing is wrong...The reason for this is likely to be hormonal changes that occur during puberty.For young man your age,the nipples will often be painful and even swell slightly.I am not sure about your nipple turning purple though,but it could also be due to puberty.Please talk to your mom or dad to take you to your family doctor who will be familiar with this condition from experience and help you understand what's happening to your body,including your nipple turning purple.Please don't worry,a lot of young men your age have this problem and have nothing to do with breast cancer okay?Take care...

Hi,I notice that you asked a similar question last month:http://www.medhelp.org/posts/Breast-Cancer/whats-wrong/show/1696181#post_7753023We would appreciate it if, in the future, you would keep all of your related posts in the same thread, so that: 1) all of your information will be available in one place, which helps us to provide better answers; 2) we will be able to see the answers that have already been given, so we do not duplicate our efforts; and 3) other members interested in this topic will be able to follow the entire discussion.Thanks and best wishes,bluebutterfly

question: Im a 12 year old adolescent male w/type 1 diabetes. For the past couple of weeks my nipples have been hard and purple and it hurts when i touch them it hurts. Is this normal?
title: whats wrong?
